entity.name: branch
entity.query: SELECT B.BRANCH_ID, B.COMPANY_ID, B.REGION_ID, B.BRANCH, B.IS_DEFAULT_BY_SYSTEM, B.STATUS, B.CREATED_ON, B.CREATED_BY, B.MODIFIED_ON, B.MODIFIED_BY,R.REGION FROM BRANCH AS B JOIN REGION AS R ON B.REGION_ID = R.REGION_ID;
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT B.BRANCH_ID, B.COMPANY_ID, B.REGION_ID, B.BRANCH, B.IS_DEFAULT_BY_SYSTEM, B.STATUS, B.CREATED_ON, B.CREATED_BY,B.MODIFIED_ON, B.MODIFIED_BY,R.REGION FROM BRANCH AS B JOIN REGION AS R ON B.REGION_ID = R.REGION_ID WHERE B.BRANCH_ID = '${dataimporter.delta.branchId}';
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT BRANCH_ID FROM BRANCH WHERE MODIFIED_ON > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD('${dataimporter.last_index_time}',INTERVAL -1 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i');
